Package org.jlab.epsci.ersap.base

Class ErsapSubscriptions.GlobalSubscriptionBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jlab.epsci.ersap.base.ErsapSubscriptions.GlobalSubscriptionBuilder
  • Enclosing class:
    ErsapSubscriptions
    public static class ErsapSubscriptions.GlobalSubscriptionBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builds a subscription to listen the different ERSAP DPE reports.

      • aliveDpes

        public ErsapSubscriptions.JsonReportSubscription aliveDpes()
        A subscription to the periodic alive message reported by all running DPEs.
        Returns:
        a subscription to listen DPE alive reports

      • aliveDpes

        public ErsapSubscriptions.JsonReportSubscription aliveDpes​(java.lang.String session)
        A subscription to the periodic alive message reported by the running DPEs with the given session.

        If the session is empty, only DPEs with no session will be listened.

        Parameters:
        session - the session to select with DPEs to monitor
        Returns:
        a subscription to listen DPE alive reports

      • dpeReport

        public ErsapSubscriptions.BaseDpeReportSubscription dpeReport()
        A subscription to the periodic runtime and registration reports of all running DPEs.
        Returns:
        a subscription to listen DPE reports

      • dpeReport

        public ErsapSubscriptions.BaseDpeReportSubscription dpeReport​(java.lang.String session)
        A subscription to the periodic runtime and registration reports of the running DPEs with the given session.

        If the session is empty, only DPEs with no session will be listened.

        Parameters:
        session - the session to select with DPEs to monitor
        Returns:
        a subscription to listen DPE reports

      • dataRing

        public ErsapSubscriptions.ServiceSubscription dataRing()
        A subscription for all events published to the ERSAP data-ring.
        Returns:
        a subscription to listen all events in the data-ring

      • dataRing

        public ErsapSubscriptions.ServiceSubscription dataRing​(DataRingTopic ringTopic)
        A subscription for events published with the given topic to the ERSAP data-ring.
        Parameters:
        ringTopic - the data-ring topic to filter events
        Returns:
        a subscription to listen events in the data-ring
